= Waves =

== TL;DR ==

*Wavelength, period, frequency and wave speed*
{{$
\frac{\lambda}{T} = \lambda f = v
}}$

*Speed of a wave on a string*
{{$
v = \sqrt{\frac{FL}{M}}
}}$

*Beat frequency*
{{$
f_{\text{beat}} = f_2 - f_1
}}$

*Wavelengths of normal modes of string*
{{$
\lambda_n = \frac{2L}{n}, n \in \N^+
}}$

*Eigenfrequencies*
{{$
f_n = \frac{nv}{2L}, n \in \N^+
}}$

== Periodic Waves ==

*Wavelength*

{{$
\frac{\lambda}{T} = v
}}$

*Speed of wave on a string*

{{$
v = \sqrt{\frac{F}{M/L}}
}}$
Where $F$ is the tension and $M/L$ is mass per length.
